name: Irresistible Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Floral.Scent Type:Fruity Floral.Key Notes:Sparkling Pear, Luscious Rose, Blond Wood.Fragrance Description:Givenchy presents a floral-wood fragrance that balances notes of luscious rose and radiant blond wood. Its top notes of sparkling fruity pear and ambrette add a subtle hint of vibrancy to this irresistible perfume with a floral heart and a touch of musk at the base..About the Bottle:The bottle, a luminous prismatic structure, features a textured pink ribbon wrapped around a metal top, representing Hubert de Givenchyu2019s love of couture fabrics. He was often inspired by the creation of opposite geometric structures, represented by the bottleu2019s multifaceted square shape..About the Fragrance:Irresistible Eau de Parfum by Givenchy is a fragrance that inspires you to let go. A floral-woody and fruity fragrance full of contrasts, Irresistible is all about freedom, confidence, and feel-good energy. Everyone is Irresistible in their own way, so let go and find your dance.
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Limonene, Geraniol, Citronellol, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Coumarin, Citral, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Bht, Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It opens with a fresh burst of juicy pear and ambrette, creating a vibrant and uplifting first impression. The heart features delicate rose, which adds a soft, feminine touch, while the base of musk and woody notes grounds the scent, making it warm and inviting. Lasting around 5u20136 hours on my skin, and the sillage is subtle yet noticeable, perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. Overall, I like this perfume but I think is going to be more suitable for older women.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very powdery, soft scent. Smells like lipstick, but in a good way. The bottle is a beautiful pale rose colour. It would be great to wear during the day, even after a shower. It lasts a long time, although it doesn't project too much because it's a very soft scent, which is not a negative thing. Overall, it's a very nice perfume.

reviews.review_title: Floral scent captured in a pink bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fresh floral scent. It smells like fresh blossom on a spring day. The pink colour theme is totally baby girl vibes. The packaging is beautiful. I love this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this scent for older women, not for those in their 20s or 30s. I ended up gifting to my mom as it was too old for me (26F). I do find the smell super nice and long lasting, just not my preference. The packaging is super cute and Iu2019m sure it would be great for others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: The smell of this is gorgeous but it is very strong, and for the price there are better alternatives so probably wouldn't repurchase. The notes are there but it smells like other perfumes Iu2019ve smelled before

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially the smell is very flowery like roses as mentioned in the description.  You donu2019t need to spray a lot, it does change smell slightly settling back on the almond and floral smell.  Itu2019s nice to have it on a day out but donu2019t put too much on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Givenchy perfume exudes timeless elegance with a perfect balance of floral, woody, and musky notes. Long-lasting and sophisticated, itu2019s a scent for every occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited for this perfume that influencer sent me. it smells incredible the scent is not strong but very subtle but beautiful and girly. The floral scent is not too strong but you can tell itu2019s a floral perfume. The packaging is beautiful itu2019s the prettiest blush pink perfect to place on my vanity. Itu2019s perfect for everyday use and you can wear it anywhere since the smell is so subtle.

reviews.review_title: The smell of freedom, confidence and positive ener
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this generous full-sized sample of Givenchy Irresistible perfume from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I was immediately impressed by the full-sized bottle which was such a wonderful surprise! The packaging is simple yet elegant, and the bottle itself is classic and easy to handle. The back features a beautiful geometric design, adding a touch of sophistication. The lid effortlessly pulls off to reveal the spray nozzle, making application a breeze.  The scent is a lovely blend of rose and blond wood, creating a light, powdery, floral fragrance that's both pleasant and easy to wear. The fragrance embodies themes of freedom, confidence, and positive energy, which is exactly what I need at this stage of my life. I truly enjoy this fragrance and highly recommend it.

These perfumes are amazing for winter! The scent lasts for hours, and itu2019s the perfect mix of sweet and fresh. It feels cozy but still light and refreshing. Iu2019ve never had a fragrance like this before. The bottle is so cute and I like the colour! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gift it to my friend and get so many positive review about it. I am definitely gonna get it for myself. I love the fragrance.
Tellement une belle odeur, douce et fruitu00e9e. Ju2019adore!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sent is absolutely incredible! It lasts all day long too! I got it as a Christmas gift and Iu2019m so so happy with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells incredible. The scent lasts pretty long.
Smell: 5/5 Flower, not too strong Roller: 0/5 : You have to push and push again and it leaves red scratches on your skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used the product once and then the roller ball quit working I canu2019t get any of the perfume out, just wasted $60 donu2019t buy it
I just love this. I don't get the people who doesn't appreciate this perfume. The scent is just right, not too strong, smells lovely and sexy. Love love love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just got it today. It smells like a floral/powderish. I think grannys would love itu270cud83cudffb Will just give it to my momud83dude2c itu2019s not bad at all but I donu2019t like the smell of it. Not my taste I guess. Just an honest review. I gues I will still stick to my versace one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pure floral on me, thereu2019s no trace of the pear on my skin, and Iu2019m not the biggest fan of florals especially very sharp ones like this so itu2019s not for me. Doesnu2019t have a strong sillage and lasts about 5 hours on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent smells really good however, after one use of the rollerball version, it is no longer coming out when I roll it on my skin. Iu2019m very disappointed because I really do like the scent so I will be donu2019t waste your money on the rollerball version of this sent ufffcreturning this. donu2019t waste your money on the rollerball version of this sent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A good option for a floral fragrance that last very long. Addicting to smell and my daily perfume as it does not very aggressive on the nose. Perfect for everyday! I will only take out one star because the coconut is a bit more powerful than the other notes

reviews.review_title: Long lasting and Enchanting fragrance! Bliss!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Givenchy perfume for free for my honest review. I have been using it from the past one month and oh boy oh it's the fragrance of my dreams. The scent is an enchanting blend of floral and woody notes that exudes elegance and sophistication. Its long-lasting fragrance leaves a captivating trail wherever I go, garnering compliments all my friends and family. Literally someone in the elevator asked me which fragrance I was wearing. The chic and modern bottle design adds a touch of luxury to my vanity. Irresistible by Givenchy is truly a fragrance that lives up to its name, making every moment memorable and leaving a lasting impression. Would definitely purchase it once I run out of this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume from Influenster and Iu2019ll be honest Iu2019m in love !! Itu2019s the perfect blend of Floral and Sweet with neither overpowering the other. Not to mention the bottle is a stunner as well !! It lasts over 8 hours on the skin making it the perfect everyday scent. Itu2019s strong but not too strong. Definitely a must have in your perfume collection !
